channel.title: Certifications on gavinmassey.net
channel.description: Recent content in Certifications on gavinmassey.net

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam, Part 2 - "Skill in" Sections
item.description: The following compilation includes content exclusively from the ‘Skills in’ sections of the AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide. These sections have been systematically divided and organized into separate articles for your convenience. For comprehensive information, please refer to the corresponding sections in the other parts of this guide. Understanding the economies of scale (for example, cost savings) Economies of scale refer to the cost advantage that arises with increased output of a product.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam, Part 3 - "Technologies and Concepts" Section
item.description: The following compilation includes content exclusively from the ‘Technologies and Concepts’ section of the AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide. These sections have been systematically divided and organized into separate articles for your convenience. For comprehensive information, please refer to the corresponding sections in the other parts of this guide. APIs: APIs in AWS enable applications to interact with AWS services. Key points include understanding RESTful APIs, API Gateway, and how APIs are used for service integration.
